'''''"Isn't Life Wondrous?"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to open the 3 destructible passages and 2 passages blocked by vines in the [[Wenut Tunnels]]:
* one by interacting with a small [[Rock Pile]] in the Wenut Tunnels: Upper Level, south of the [[City of the Deceased]],
* one by activating the {{Dendro}} [[Elemental Monument]] even farther south in the Wenut Tunnels: Upper Level,
* one by following a [[Seelie]] found in the path east of the [[Setekh Wenut]] in the Wenut Tunnels: Upper Level,
* one by activating the {{Dendro}} [[Elemental Monument]] in the Wenut Tunnels: Middle Level,
* one by activating the {{Anemo}} [[Elemental Monument]] at the deepest part of the Wenut Tunnels: Lower Level,

==Trivia==
* The achievement's description may be a reference to the 1993 movie ''{{w|Jurassic Park (film)|Jurassic Park}}'', in which the character Dr. Malcolm says the quote "life finds a way."
